declarations.name: cn
declarations.description: Combines multiple class values into a single string, merging Tailwind CSS classes intelligently. It uses 'clsx' to join class values and 'tailwind-merge' to resolve conflicting Tailwind classes.

parameters.description: A variable number of class values (strings, arrays, objects, etc.) to be combined.

returns.description: A single string of merged class names.

declarations.implementationNotes: Uses 'clsx' to join class values and 'twMerge' to resolve Tailwind CSS class conflicts. Useful for conditionally applying classes in React components.
